content: I am a research technician and software engineer at the Mobile Perception Systems lab of the Video Coding and Architectures research group at TU/e. My mission is to contribute to the lab's artificial intelligence research software for autonomous systems (self-driving cars). I am involved in 5G-MOBIX project. My interests include machine learning, data science, computer vision, and software engineering of safe control systems.

title: Pavol Jancura
